ComicInfo.Summary:
From the tales of Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, The Little Mermaid and Snow White comes Damsels!
While the Villeneuve army battle the fairy forces, Rapa, Talia, Red and Heinrich arrive at the Great Oak in the heart of the Enchanted Forest. They are welcomed by King Oberon, who it seems has been expecting them. Fresh from their battle with the Dryads, the Queens Rapunzel and Talia reach the Kingdom of Villeneuve at last. There they and Queen Belle can finally seal
their magical compact and begin their reign of dark sorcery.
